website_summaries.verdict: The M4 Aqua starts well with its luscious looks and affordable price, but the abysmal camera and storage woes quickly take the shine off an otherwise decent handset.
pros: The Sony Xperia M4 Aqua's slick, minimalist design is very similar to that of the top-end Xperia Z3
Its waterproof body makes it usable in the shower, and its capable processor handles the essentials well
cons: The camera is truly awful, making it a bad choice for anyone keen on photography
There's a pitiful amount of storage, and Sony's insistence on bundling apps and widgets makes the phone cluttered right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, this phone is really comfortable in the hand ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad , this phone is really comfortable in the hand and the waterproof feature makes it better. Camera is really good but not so good in low light. For me battery life wasn't the greatest but it does last a whole day . I'm just used to higher batteries on phones . the phone did had some problems running high graphic games and will heat up a lot specially while charging and for that reason I returned it . other than the overheating issue I really liked the phone , I just wish an update can improve the kag and overheating .
customer_reviews.author: Galio

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product on january 2016 as new. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on january 2016 as new. I had an issue with my Sony Xperia M4 recently. I dropped it in water however it said that it is waterproof it is not working anymore. So I went to a Sony technical service and they opened it, then they realized that the cellphone was not new. I feel that I was swindled, because I paid for a new product but instead I got one refurbished one.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: The screen can get pretty warm at times but it hasn't overheated
customer_reviews.text: *Update after 5 months* Loud speakers blew out. I'm pretty sure it's from being caught in heavy rain a couple weeks ago. Buy this POS at your own risk. It's cheaper right now so it could be worth the money. I've had this phone for a couple months now. I really haven't had a problem with it. The screen can get pretty warm at times but it hasn't overheated. The camera is really nice just not great in horrible lighting and the battery life can drain pretty quickly depending on the activity, but that's fine lol my only real gripe is that there aren't any good (protective) cases for it.
customer_reviews.author: SRC09

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a review on both the product and Sony's service. Four months after I bought it the screen was having issues. A vertical band of dead pixels on the right side of the screen. Sony received the RMA shipment on May 25th. Their service terms claim a 15 business day turnaround time. Till date they have not been able to tell me when I would receive the repaired phone. Calls and chats with customer service department end with -- " we don't have any information at this time. Contact us next week...". I would have been better off returning the phone to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone ever.....
customer_reviews.text: Wish there were a scope of giving a negative rating. Within 10 months of the purchase, the phone started acting wierd. At first, it was the random power off and on issue. Then the phone got stuck in the Sony logo screen for good. Tried everything including factory reset, Xperia Companion Tool, and all the methods that are available online without any success. Now it's being used as a paper weight. No wonder why sony is going down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lag and Heat
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with everyone that says, "the phone has a heating problem." Apart from the heating issue for minimal use; the phone lags doing stuff that my Nexus 4(2012) does with out lag. I bought it for $145 and it is what it is. I do like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Silence Dogood

customer_reviews.title: nice until it won't stop rebooting
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice phone while it lasted. Worked well for pictures and any apps/games that I wanted. Good call quality, battery life, screen size, and overall nice phone. After about 1 1/2 years of moderate use, I woke up to the phone loop-restarting. It has had occasional time periods of functioning, lasting around 10 minutes, but then reverts to the loop-restart. Since it is beyond the warranty date, Sony won't do anything for it, and I'm stuck with a plastic paperweight. That may be the new norm for phones, though.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I like this phone and its Sony features
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone and its Sony features,,, especially the waterproof feature, though I have not dropped my phone into 5 feet of water yet. I have not experienced the battery lasting and entire 24 hour period yet or a 14 hour period where I didn't have to recharge this phone. My advice is, if you plan to take an extended trip some where be sure to take your charging cable and a spare charge.I do like the phone anyway.
customer_reviews.author: mrtibbs51

customer_reviews.title: new phone time!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product very quickly after purchase (I ordered it monday and got it on friday). So i really liked that. It was a new phone, the color on the box was not the color of the phone, which i didn't mind at all. (The box showed a white phone, though i had ordered a black one) Turned it on and works beautifully right now. Price: not terrible for this phone, so all around I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kaie

customer_reviews.title: Indestructable and completely Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever had! The only downside is camera quality a bit laggy but great phone. Mine had been run over, stopped on, thrown against concrete, and submerged in dirty water for about 18 hrs. and it's only quirk was the proximity sensor went out mostly just due to the age of the phone because I've had it for going on 5 years now, a little bit less. Got it when it first came out, whenever that was. I would give 10 star's if I could, and I would recommend this phone to anyone. BTW, did I mention it's very fast and handles the largest and most resource hungry apps with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S Legg

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Sony
customer_reviews.text: The phone isn't bad per se but I had an issue with the USB port a couple of months after buying it and Sony's customer service is pretty bad. In the end I would have needed to be without my phone for about 1 month and with no replacement or even guarantee of repairing the issue even though the phone has no signs of misuse and my issue was a clear "wear" issue that shouldn't be happening after 3 months of use (warranty is of 1y). Spend some more on a brand that provides good costumer service and that is actually able to provide you with practical and feasible solutions. Don't buy Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Goncalo Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: What in the world Sony????!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally decided to write a review about this phone only because of the issues i've been having lately with it. for the past week its been going through boot loop and wireless not working. Apparently this was a known issue back in mid 2015 and also very common with this phone. Like I said though it has worked for me flawlessly for the past year and a half. I will be sending this in as suggested on the Sony Forums because at this point it's definitely the hardware. I will keep this review updated with the results after I send it in. Thanks Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: NO PRODUCT SUPPORT/REPAIR AFTER 12 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my daughter. She dropped the phone with the gorilla glass and it cracked. I contacted Sony to get it repaired at one of their authorized repair facility, realizing it was out of warranty. I was informed there is no facility to repair cell phones (unless you're still in warranty). So you're on your own. I wouldn't purchase this phone again and regret the purchase. it's not advertised you have no support. I believe the money would have been better spent on a product with customer care department.
customer_reviews.author: tyraandbanks

customer_reviews.title: Heats up too much, other wise a decent looking light phone with ok picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but heats up too much and ended up returning it. Video is stable but still photo lacks quality. Bought a moto G3 later which is way better. But I liked the lightweight, looks and dust proof of this phone and hence 3 stars. But sadly it is an electric iron box.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: No english instructions
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my son as a birthday present. Sony has always been a high quality name brand but this phone is not. Turns off several times a day called Death screen. Takes forever to turn back on No instructions in English. Made in Brazil with there language. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Constance A. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: worthless phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone was slow and buggy from the start, i didnt expect much but it was worse than i expected. crappy battery life, and it started having random restarts and now wont power on at 4 months old. its never been beaten up or wet. just not a well designed piece of electronics and now i am out the $200.00 i paid
customer_reviews.author: J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: M4 Aqua - good midrange phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. The lowest I've ever paid for a smartphone, yet better than any I have had. Colors pop, great sound from the speaker on the bottom. Came with 16GB of non-volatile memory, has expansion slot for micoSD card up to 128GB. Unless you are a pro photog, the camera is more than adequate. Battery life seems typical of what I have experienced with other phones.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: The back camera doesn't work anymore after a year
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy Sony Xperia M4 Aqua phone in july 2016 and kept it under protective cover. I enjoyed using it as phone as well as for it's excellent camera functions. Untill today when suddenly the back camera heated up extremely while having a video chat and since then the back camera is completely blurry. Disappointed that Sony's product is of such bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: everything works great but irritating you can't use the phone while its charging cuz it glitches
customer_reviews.author: raeofsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - except battery life is awful
customer_reviews.text: Great phone - except battery life is awful. Phone, hardware and operations is, in my opinion, great so much that I continue to use this phone despite its short battery life. and for the price I paid (amazon holiday sale $150) I cant complain a bit
customer_reviews.author: sebastian alexander

customer_reviews.title: Cheap phone that has very good specs for the price ($150)
customer_reviews.text: Cheap phone that has very good specs for the price ($150). Very good for parents or people who use the phone for simple things such as calling and web browsing and google features.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: it is such a great phone, i love sony phones but unfortunately could ...
customer_reviews.text: it is such a great phone, i love sony phones but unfortunately could not afford the Xperia Z5 so I purchased this instead. only thing i would say is disappointing is the camera. Quality of photos are okay at best, my Xperia Z1 had a much better camera and I am disappointed with this. Thats the only problem i have

customer_reviews.title: 💯💯

customer_reviews.title: The phone has some performance issues. It does not ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone has some performance issues. It does not automatically connect to known WiFi connections and there are audio issues where it has difficult switching between headphones, to Bluetooth to normal use. Each time this happens a factory reset appears to correct the issue, but clearly that is inconvenient.

customer_reviews.title: Really bad phone. Broke down within a year
customer_reviews.text: Really bad phone. Broke down within a year, battery life is horrible. Bought in April 2016 Now completely black and I can not see the screen in May 2017. A piece of junk.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Decent quality phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Decent quality phone for the price. This phone lacks a few things that my s5 has, but it makes up for lack of hardware with great Sony software.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good to go.

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap phone with a regular 9 MP camera, the 13 MP is only 4:3 size.
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked good during the first 6 months, then it just started to reboot continuosly while I was making calls or using some apps, also turning off the wifi and bluetooth, having to reset the phone several times in the day. Finally I decided to give it away and get a Nexus phone. Also the 13 MP camera resolution is only available in 4:3 size, not the 16:9 full screen. The same for the front 5 MP camera.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price range
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price range, but there is some noticeable lags now and then. There is one issue with the recording of videos, when i want to view the videos it only shows a black screen with audio only. Restarting the device seems to fix the problem but i don't know if it is permanent. If this issue can be fixed permanently then this phone gets 5 stars :)

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: It worked all around pretty well. My workplace environment got it pretty dirty but I would wash it off in the sink at the end of my shift and it would be good again.

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone and it's under water capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone and it's under water capabilities. But the screen spiderwebed the first time I dropped it. :/ so the weakest screen on an xperia I've had so far. Also major battery problems, had it for little over 6 months and one day the screen completely flashed blue and the wouldnt turn on. quite upset.

customer_reviews.title: ... is my second Xperia phone and boy do I love it. It does everything my Samsung Galaxy S5 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Xperia phone and boy do I love it. It does everything my Samsung Galaxy S5 did. For the price it was a steal. I see now I should have just stayed with a Sony phone. The pictures are perfect. The screen is vibrant with colors. I recommend this phone.

The phone gets really hot within a few minutes...it's like someone gave you their old phone and not you having bought a new phone...totally disappointing!

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone because it's well made and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone because it's well made and reasonably priced. However I do not know how reliable it will be in the long run.

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing phone for the price you pay for it with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an good phone for the price you pay for it with a fluent minimalist interface that I like much more than other Android customizations, like TouchWiz. My only complaints would be that sometimes the colors of my photos are a little bit opaque for my taste and that, although the phone has a good battery life it is far from the two days promised by Sony.

The problem is I can't make phone calls normally, microphone is not working, the only turnaround is turning on the speakers. It's a software issue related to Android Lollipop, it's not a hardware problem.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone does everything as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone does everything as advertised. I'm very happy. For the money you would be hard pressed to find a phone with similar features.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever for only $200
customer_reviews.text: An amazing phone, is only $200 but it works as similar as other most expensive phones. I love the camera, the battery, the design. It is amazing and it works as good as a phone of $400

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! This is a great phone, I don't know about the comments regarding the camera quality, it blows my S5 and Nexus 5x away. Have not had any over heating issues either but I'm not running a bunch of apps at the same time. Works great on Tmobile network. Wait for it to go on sale and for the price it can't be beat.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad it's waterproof and dustproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my brother. He loves it. I'm glad it's waterproof and dustproof, as he can be kind of clumsy and forgetful at times. I bought an Xperia L two years ago from Amazon, while it still works just fine, it shows its age, and this one makes me want to get a newer one.

customer_reviews.text: Nice phone for the price. Has everything I wanted in a smart phone system. Voice quality is good. playing your music or listening to the radio comes out quite clear and I have no problems with any additional apps which I added.

customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, but it has too many problems to keep. It's a great size, lightweight and waterproof. However, the battery life on it is horrible when playing games, it drops > 10% in half an hour. Like many other users have mentioned it gets really hot. Games like Bubble Witch crash or lock up when playing for more than 15 minutes.

Cobtiuesly having issues of restart regardless of uninstalling lot of apps and running with n dafe mode for a while. I always think Sony is good because t thisnone failed. May be next time I should think or wait till get a good review on new phones.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this phone
customer_reviews.text: this phone is nothing close to what a Sony phone should be. Its battery is pathetically weak. processing is slow. the original battery charger has already stopped working. it hangs, it becomes unresponsive so many times. its software has a problem, specially video playback hangs very often. Sony support doesn't support. I will not advice anyone to buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a while, now it restarts on its own, rejects the Sim card often and the speaker to hear calls doesn't work. I've kept the phone in excellent condition with a case and this still happened, I expected more from and "outdoor water proof phone" I never did test how water proof it is but I'm afraid it'll stop working if I do, now I have to buy a new phone since this one sucked. I bought it in December and it's now mid April so 5months of life then it goes to s***
customer_reviews.author: Abimael D.

customer_reviews.title: not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: for the price it is a decent phone. specs, waterproof, weight, and size. The camera however for the high pixels wasn't that great and the phone couldn't record any videos, all we get was a black screen with audio only. After a google search we weren't the only ones experiencing this problem. Haven't experience overheating but do get random power off where only a hard reset will solve it, not reliable if it shut off and you're expecting calls or alarms. The seller and shipping was great, not so much the phone. I say pass and get something more reliable and less bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really liked this phone
customer_reviews.text: Only getting three stars because i have to send back. Really liked this phone, but i got a defective unit that powers off and back on by itself.... even with a full charge.might take the difference and upgrade to z3+
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm still getting used to it and as usual comes with a lot of apps that you don't want or need but speed is good is easy to customize and was able to do the transition from my old phone pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Battery drain issue
customer_reviews.text: The phone does not provide more than 5hours of battery life in wifi mode and the battery keeps on draining even when stamina or ultra stamina mode is activated. Also the back panel gets heated up during charging or streaming videos or playing music. I am not satisfied at all with this sony product. I had ordered a replacement hoping that the next one would give a better battery life but it turned out to be same. I am going to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia M4 Aqua 16GB GSM/LTE Unlocked Cell Phone - Black (U.S. Warranty)
product_meta.description:
Style:Regular

No contracts. No locked-in commitment to a specific carrier. The Sony Xperia M4 Aqua SIM unlocked smartphone gives you wireless freedom. With SIM unlocked, you have more choice when selecting a GSM service provider. The Sony Xperia M4 Aqua lets you capture memories anywhere with two excellent cameras, including a 13MP camera featuring Superior Auto technology, which recognizes 52 different scenes (including twilight and gourmet mode) and adjusts automatically for amazing photos. Xperia M4 Aqua’s waterproof design lets you use it where others cannot go – like when recording a video or taking photos at a concert in the rain. It also allows you to take your active lifestyle further thanks to a powerful battery that keeps your smartphone going for up to two days on a single charge. 

 Xperia M4 Aqua is compatible with GSM Networks, including AT&T, T-Mobile, and cellular network providers utilizing GSM network (such as Brightspot, Cricket Wireless, h20 Wireless, MetroPCS, Net10, Simple Mobile, Straight Talk and Walmart Family Mobile). Xperia M4 Aqua is not compatible with CDMA Networks such as Sprint, US Cellular and Verizon. It supports the following bands: GSM/EDGE (850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz), UMTS/HSPA+ (850, 900, 1700/2100, 1900, 2100 MHz), and LTE (Bands 2, 4, 5, 7, 12, 13, 17). 

 

SUPPORT FOR YOUR DEVICE. 
Use the Support application called XPERIA CARE in your device to search a user guide, read troubleshooting guides, and find information about software updates and other product-related information. Make sure you have a working Internet connection, preferably over Wi-Fi, to limit data charges when using the support application. 



SUPPORT CONTACTS
Xperia Care Online Chat support: Monday to Sunday: 8am - 11pm EST Phone: Monday to Sunday: 8am - 11pm EST +1 866-737-7733 Email: warrantyna@support.sonymobile.com 

Support application in your device: SUPPORT app.
feature_bullets: SIM unlocked means no contracts or commitment to a specific carrier. Compatible with GSM Networks including AT&T, T-Mobile and cellular network providers utilizing GSM network such as: Straight Talk, MetroPCS, Simple Mobile, Brightspot, Net10, h20 Wireless, and Cricket Wireless
This device is not compatible with CDMA Networks such as: Verizon, Sprint, and US Cellular. Fits devices 15.2 x 1.2 x 10.5 in
Works with nano sim. Waterproof design: Don’t let the mud, or a spill, or the wet weather slow you down
Two excellent point-and-shoot cameras: Perfect photos for whenever or whatever you're shooting
Up to two days of battery life: Stay out longer doing what you love without having to recharge
Octa-core processor: Superior performance, easy multitasking, and faster downloads
